thread.section_title: Hotel Odeon Saint-Germain - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Something very special
thread.title_full: Something very special - Review of Hotel Odeon Saint-Germain, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: VETTRAN
title: Something very special
text:
Spent 7 nights in Hotel Odeon. Extremely charming hotel with great location in St. Germaine. Excellent and extremely professional staff. We had the suite on the 5th floor which was terrific. Highly recommend that room. One could tell that the clientele were repeats many of which have been patronizing the hotel for many years. Would not hesitate recommending this property it's great.
Room Tip: Request the suite on the 5th floor. It's one pictured on the website. See more room tips
